author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Implemented different ID prefix support for ezcXmlTree - the default
- Changed class structure with datastores so that they implement (multiple)
interfaces instead of extending a class. This allows data stores of a different
type that backends to be used together. For example this makes it possible
to store the tree structure in an XML file and still use a database based
backend to store the real data in.

author: rb:ez.no
msg: - Added a better error message when an external (use) variable is not given.

author: as:ez.no
msg: - Implemented feature request #11296: added the function getCurrentUrl() to
ezcUrlTools to build the current URL from the $_SERVER array or another
